pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, February 11, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will receive a COVID‑19 briefing from Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will participate in a meeting hosted by the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden, with the leaders of France, Germany, Italy, Poland, the United Kingdom, the European Union, and NATO, to discuss Ukraine.

Closed to media

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability.

Third floor foyer
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7519
    Toll-free: 1-877-413-4814
    Pass code: 6915639#
